title: Petition to Promote Access to Vote for Sri Lankan’s Abroad
content: Recently, Milinda Moragoda, Minister of Justice and Law Reform, and the leader of the Sri Lanka National Congress (SLNC), a constituent party of the United People’s Freedom Alliance launched a website to to ‘Promote Access to Voting for Sri Lankan’s Abroad.’ While launching www.slnc.org website Minister Milinda Moragoda said the Vote” is a universal human…
